activity.name: Navision Ticket Wait
activity.description:
angelegt --> step wait : ticket has been created and ticketnumber is available beendet --> step complete : ticket has been finished
timeoutAngelegt --> step paused : nav ticket has not been created from webeinmeldung. stop polling, wait for user to activate again timeoutBeendet --> step paused : nav ticket has not been finished. stop polling, wait for user to activate again
storno --> step complete : nav ticket has been cancelled
